title: Tumor microenvironment-regulated drug delivery system combined with sonodynamic therapy for the synergistic treatment of breast cancer
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17612-17626
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00539B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Chao Qian, Guoliang Zhao, Mengping Huo, Meixia Su, Xuexue Hu, Qiang Liu, Lei Wang
Co-loading of sonosensitizers and chemotherapeutic drugs into nanocarriers can provide a robust platform to orchestrate the synergistic interplay between chemotherapy and sonodynamic therapy (SDT) in cancer treatment.
